title: A most elegant and religious rapture composed by Mr. Samuel Ward (that sometime famous and pious pastor at Ipswich) during his Episcopal imprisonment in the Gate-House, and by him dedicated to King Charles the First. Now, most exactly Englished by John Vicars.
author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.
publisher: Printed for Tho. Maxey, and are to be sold in Thames-street, neer St Benet Paul's Warf,
